data.text: Previously, when the leaders of Israel spoke,
Now they sin more and more;
Therefore, those people will disappear quickly like [SIM] the morning mist or the dew that lies on the ground early in the morning;
But Yahweh says to his people, â€œI am Yahweh, your God,
I took care of your ancestors when they were in the desert,
When I provided food for them,
So I will attack you like [SIM] a lion attacks other animals;
Like [SIM] a female bear attacks anyone that steals her cubs,
You people of Israel, you will be destroyed
I was angry with them for requesting that,
I have written on a scroll a record of the sins that have been committed by you people of Israel,
I certainly will not [RHQ] save you from being killed
Even if you people of Israel prosper more than the nearby nations do,
You people of Samaria must be punished
